tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audience (
  audience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  audience_name VARCHAR(255),
  audience_age INT,
  audience_gender VARCHAR(10),
  audience_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE media_outlets (
    outlet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    outlet_name VARCHAR(255),
    outlet_type VARCHAR(50),
    audience_reach BIGINT
)

CREATE TABLE audience_demographics (
    demographic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    outlet_id INT,
    age_group VARCHAR(20),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    audience_size BIGINT
)

CREATE TABLE advertising_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE viewer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    viewer_name VARCHAR(100),
    rating INT,
    comment TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Articles (
    article_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    article_content TEXT,
    outlet_id INT REFERENCES MediaOutlets(outlet_id),
    author_id INT REFERENCES Authors(author_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ReaderInteractions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    article_id INT REFERENCES Articles(article_id),
    reader_id INT REFERENCES Readers(reader_id),
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP
);
